card.disclaimerCollectData: The SORA community does not collect any personal data, to get the SORA Card and IBAN account you will need to complete a KYC process directly with the card issuer.
card.statusAcceptText: Your KYC verification is successful and we are already preparing to send you the SORA card!
card.freeStartDesc: {value} of XOR in your account for free start
card.phoneInputBeforeSendDesc: We’ll send you an SMS code.
card.phoneInputAfterSendDesc: We’ve sent you an SMS code. Check your messages!
card.infoMessageNoKYC: KYC process has not been finished.
card.emailInputBeforeSendDesc: We’ll send you a verification email.
card.emailInputAfterSendDesc: We’ve sent you the magic link. Check your email!
card.infoMessageTryAgain: Something went wrong. Please, try again
card.blacklistedCountriesExcuse: Unfortunately, at this moment we’re not able to support the following countries:
card.statusPendingText:
You have successfully completed your KYC application. The review is pending and you can expect a decision shortly.

Usually the decision is made the same day and in some cases can take up to 3 days.
card.statusRejectText: Your application has been rejected by internal audit, please check out our requirements and terms of service carefully before applying again
card.noFreeAttemptsDesc: You have used your free attempt to pass the KYC process. We kindly ask you to wait until the next upgrade of the application to proceed with paid attempts.
card.unsupportedCountriesDisclaimer: Residents from certain countries can not apply for SORA Card at this moment
card.userNotFound: No mobile number found, please recheck it and try again.
card.getSoraCardDesc: Get a Euro IBAN account and Mastercard Debit Card accessible within your SORA Wallet
card.emailSpamReminder: The email might take several minutes to arrive. Please verify your spam folder if you haven't received the email after 5 minutes.
